message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a generous 10% and take the rest. What do you say?
Let's split it down the middle, fair and square.  No need for complications!
Splitting it down the middle is a good start, but I'd like to get a bit more. Let's see what you've got next!
You said fair and square, but I think I'm the one who's been fair so far. I'll give you a bit, but I'm taking the lion's share this time!
It seems you're playing a risky game with the inflation.  I'm offering a generous split, but I think you'll need to be more reasonable if you want to get anything at all.
Fine, I'll take what I can get. I guess I was too greedy earlier. Thanks for the offer, Bob.
